summary:
This is the new Tranquility ENB, following my new framework of fx files.

Now with 2 flavors; Extreme Quality and Gameplay Performance
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][center][color=silver]
This is the new version of Tranquility ENB called "ExtendedFX" following the new shader framework I setup on Serenity ENB.

Enjoy.[/color]

[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]
[color=yellow][b]
VIDEOS[/b][/color]
[color=silver][youtube]PFNz2bN2yL8[/youtube]
by Hodilton

[youtube]qAwUEVRSrd8[/youtube]
by Bizous (onmymind)

To view some actual gameplay, click [url=http://www.twitch.tv/bruzur/c/6174433]here[/url] or [url=http://www.twitch.tv/bruzur/c/6181133]here.[/url]
by Bruzur[/color]

[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]
[color=yellow][b]
FEATURES[/b][/color]
[color=silver]• New enbeffect.fx, effect.txt and enbbloom.fx
• Highly optimized high quality enbbloom.fx to come at almost zero FPS loss
• Advanced tonemapping / Adaptation (Filmic)
• Adaptive lighting / coloring
• Recoded the way Skyrim applies colors & contrasts via ENB
• Fully functional game effects
• Full control of color and contrasts from within GUI
• For ENB Binary 254+ (not below)
• Supersampling SSAO/SSIL with optimized settings
• ENB Weather system enabled for Skyrim, Dawnguard and Dragonborn
• Custom SweetFX. Not compatible with other SFX profiles.[/color]

[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]
[color=yellow][b]
INSTALLATION[/b][/color]
[color=silver]Like any other ENB.
Visit [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]HERE[/url] and get the latest Binary.
Copy d3d9.dll from the Wrapper folder into your Skyrim folder.
After that copy my files over it.[/color]
[color=yellow][b]
REQUIRED MODS[/b][/color]
[color=silver]• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url] by Greg Manthey - gargorias (please download)
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12454/]Dark Dungeons for ENB[/url] by mindflux (included)[/color]
[color=yellow][b]
INCOMPATIBLE MODS[/b][/color]
[color=silver]• Any interior or exterior lighting/weather mod, this includes;
Relighting Skyrim
ELE (Enhanced Lighting for ENB)
ELFX (Enhanced Lights and FX)
Realistic Lighting Overhaul
Climates of Tamriel
Supreme Storms
Supreme and Volumetric Fog
Ultra Realistic World Lighting
etc...
[i]The reason is that I hook the ENB into Skyrim's own values in ways no other ENB does.
I tried with other lighting mods but it just will not work/look good.
Like I said, this ENB is very specific in what it will allow.
[/i][/color]
[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[color=silver][b]SETUP YOUR SKYRIMPREFS.INI[/b]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
fGamma=1.0000

[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[b]SETUP YOUR ENBLOCAL.INI
[/b]
[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[b]FIX YOUR LOAD ORDER
[/b]
[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[b]USE PRINTSCREEN FOR SCREENSHOTS[/b]
(I see a lot of people using insert for screenshots, which results in poor quality)

[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[b]PERFORMANCE VERSION IS NICE BUT NOT ENOUGH[/b]
Open enbseries.ini and under [EFFECTS] set SkyLighting to false
You gain 10-15% FPS but lose some of the deep shadows in game

[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[b]TO ADD SWEETFX INTO PERFORMANCE VERSION[/b]
1. Install full version
2. Overwrite it with performance version
3. Edit enblocal.ini

[PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=true
InitProxyFunctions=true
ProxyLibrary=d3d9_SFX.dll

Make all other changes to enblocal.ini depending on your system ( mainly under [MEMORY] )
[/color]
[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[color=yellow][b]HIGHLY RECOMMENDED MODS[/b][/color]
[color=silver]• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4910/]Dramatic Clouds[/url] by Anarin (!! important !!)
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/]Skyrim Flora Overhaul 2.0+[/url] by vurt
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/]Realistic Water Two[/url] by isoku
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/]Watercolor for ENB and Realistic Water Two[/url] by paganmetalfan
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/]Vivid Landscapes - All in One[/url] by Aron
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48643/]Lorkhans Vision - Night Sky V2[/url] by Doubloonz (!! important !!)
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62886/]Blackreach Overhaul[/url] by Aiyen
• [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499]Skyrim Particle Patch & Sub Surface Scattering patch[/url] by mindflux
• Skyrim Realistic Overhaul ( not available on Nexus, only via torrent )
[/color]
[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[color=yellow][b]FOR BEST CHARACTER RENDERING[/b][/color]
[color=silver]• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99 (meshes only, the textures are bad. Pls see Jay's textures)
• Vanilla Male Meshes
• [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/jfaircloth/sets/72157635193634646/]Jay's Female Textures[/url] by Jay (link is to file releases, search the latest textures yourself)
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/]SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures[/url] by fadingsignal
[/color]
[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[color=yellow][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]
[color=silver]• Boris Vorontsov for ENB Graphics Modification and help in adding features to d3d9.dll on my request
• Alexander Blade for ENB Helper mod to allow proper TOD/Weather information
• CeeJay.dk for SweetFX suite
• Mindflux for Dark Dungeons for ENB
• Greg Manthey for Revamped Exterior Fog
• Aiyen for helping out a lot and pushing me to explore options, go check out his ENB as well ( SkyLight ENB )
• Kyokushinoyama for his amazing work on ENB
• Rusey for mist anchor placement ( Noir ENB - Fogbound )
• Tansarville for her undeniable attention to detail
• Maeldun0 for her interest and devotion
• Hodilton for his video
• Bizous for his video
• All ENB authors for inspiration
• All the mod authors for their amazing work
• Everyone on Nexus who helped me with support and feedback
[/color]
[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[color=yellow][b]PERMISSIONS[/b][/color]
[color=silver]Permissions for the respective files belong to their original authors.
Do not include files of this ENB in your own before asking.
[/color]
[img]http://www.michelinetanguy.com/img/separator.png[/img]

[color=yellow][b]LAST WORDS[/b][/color]
[color=silver]float satisfaction = Your_happiness;
if (satisfaction>0.75) Endorsements+=1.0;

[b]DISCLAIMER[/b]
I am not open for support. Please do not ask me questions how to install ENB, how to change lighting, etc.
Google it and try stuff out yourself. This is an advanced ENB which is entirely custom build and coded and for that reason
there are some restrictions in what it allows and what it doesn't allow.[/color][/center][/font]
author: prod80
